actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact dodge GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 -20 -20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe2 3 3
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health FLAT origin_aoe3 100 100
age_of_exile stat give @s exact mana FLAT origin_aoe4 100 100
age_of_exile stat give @s exact armor GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe5 -20 -20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact axe_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe6 15 15

name: 능력치
description:
체력,마나,피해량이 증가하고, 방어력과 회피가 감소합니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 도끼 피해 +15%
